Hyperliquid Strategies Announces $30M Buyback to Boost HYPE Exposure


Hyperliquid Strategies (PURR), a major HYPE token treasury, has launched a $30 million stock repurchase program just days after going live.


The firm says the goal is to increase shareholders‚Äô exposure to $HYPE as efficiently as possible - aligning with the broader trend of digital asset treasuries using buybacks to support token-linked equities.


Formed through a recent merger between Sonnet BioTherapeutics and SPAC Rorschach, PURR began trading on Nasdaq on Dec. 3 and currently sits near $3.64.

$HYPE just recovered sharply from the 26.85 low after several days of heavy selling pressure. The market swept liquidity below the previous support and immediately bounced back, showing buyers are defending this area strongly. On the 15m chart, momentum flipped upward with a clean breakout candle and increasing volume, suggesting a short-term bullish continuation.

Support zones are seen at 28.20 (minor) and 26.85 (major), while resistance sits at 29.95 and 30.60, the levels where price recently rejected. Sentiment is improving as buyers return after a deep dip, and fundamentals remain stable with no negative news driving the drop ‚Äî meaning the sell-off was technical, not fundamental. This gives the long scalp a higher probability as long as the candle structure stays above intraday moving averages.
If BTC behaves well, HYPE is ready for a pump! The target is VWAP upper boundary at roughly $39! Invalidation is below yearly VWAP. #crypto  $BTC  $HYPE

Yesterday's $HYPE setup study room ‚úçÔ∏è


We got a deviation below the weekly low (which was also a poor low) that immediately retraced back as a 1h engulfing candle


Usually, any pullbacks into the mid area of that candle is a good punt, but in this case, the main focus is that you base above the low and establish support


> candles start closing above the level
> price reclaims 1h trend
> tags WO


HTF is still in a downtrend structure, so the setup ends here.
